alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:00AM MST until December 28 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow and patchy blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with locally higher amounts possible over the highest elevations. Southwest winds gusting to near 35 mph, leading to areas of patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Black Mesa, including Shonto. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel. Areas of patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility at times. Hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Snow forecast from 11 AM this morning to 8 PM this evening: Shonto 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
